title: Ruth Fuller, MD Endowed Lectureship Fund
description: To provide support for a visiting professorship and lectureship series in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: The Ruth Fuller, MD, Lectureship, named in honor of Ruth Louvenia Fuller, MD, who was a member of the Department of Psychiatry at the CU School of Medicine. Lecturers will focus on the need for cultural competency, inclusivity, and diversity in the medical profession.
